overview_of_class: Meetings tentatively every third Friday of the month at 12:30-1:50 PM: Sept 22nd **, Oct 20th, Nov 17th, Jan 19th, Feb 16th, March 16th, April 20th, May 18th. Attendance of an assigned minimum number of public talks, museum visits and other events is also required. Although this is a one-unit course, students should register for all three quarters (0-0-1). Please note that in terms of your course load, this will count as a SPRING QUARTER registration
name: Global and Avant-Garde Studies Colloquium
